step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are correctly placing your hands on your abdomen. Ensure you are ready for the next step.
Great inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Well done relaxing your muscles on the exhale. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe.
Second rep starting well. Maintain a comfortable posture and keep hands on your abdomen.
Hands are correctly placed. Prepare for the deep inhale.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening. Keep visualizing the fluid movement towards your chest.
You're doing great with the exhale and muscle relaxation. Continue visualizing fluid expulsion.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep up the good work with this important lymphatic exercise.
